description:
8.80 crystalizer
Simple algorithm for audio noise sharpening.

This filter linearly increases differences between each audio sample.

The filter accepts the following options:

c.description: Enable clipping. By default, it is enabled.

i.description: Sets the intensity of effect. Must be in the range between -10.0 to 0 (unchanged sound) to 10.0 (maximum effect). To inverse filtering, use a negative value.

name: crystalizer

parameters.description: Sets the intensity of effect (default: 2.0). Must be in range between -10.0 to 0 (unchanged sound) to 10.0 (maximum effect). To inverse filtering use negative value.
